biocontainers.name: bioconductor-systempiper
biocontainers.summary: R package for building and running automated end-to-end analysis workflows for a wide range of ngs applications such as rna-seq, chip-seq, var-seq and ribo-seq. important features include a uniform workflow interface across them, automated report generation, and support for running both r and command-line software, such as ngs aligners or peak/variant callers, on local computers or compute clusters.
